mapper.insert: insert into TB_RANDOM_MONEY (OWNER_ID, ROOM_ID, TOKEN, TOTAL_MONEY, DISTRIBUTION_SIZE, CRETE_DATETIME) VALUES (#{ownerId}, #{roomId}, #{token}, #{totalMoney}, #{distributionSize}, NOW())

insert into TB_RANDOM_MONEY_DIST (META_INFO_SEQ, DIST_SEQ, AMOUNT, CRETE_DATETIME) VALUES
(#{item.metaInfoSeq}, #{item.distSeq}, #{item.amount}, NOW())
mapper.select: select OWNER_ID, ROOM_ID, TOKEN, TOTAL_MONEY, DISTRIBUTION_SIZE, CRETE_DATETIME from TB_RANDOM_MONEY where ROOM_ID = #{roomId} AND TOKEN = #{token} AND CRETE_DATETIME > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)
